simulation_demos.title: High-Speed SerDes Transmitter
simulation_demos.subtitle: Initial Eye Diagram Simulation
simulation_demos.description: This project focuses on the architecture of a 56Gbps PAM4 transmitter. In this phase, I am verifying the equalization logic using Cadence Virtuoso. The figure demonstrates the adaptive equalizer convergence and the resulting eye opening after channel loss.

simulation_demos.title: Mixed-Signal Layout Automation
simulation_demos.subtitle: Scripting in SKILL & Python
simulation_demos.description: An ongoing effort to automate the layout generation for differential pairs to minimize parasitic mismatch. This tool takes a netlist as input and automatically places devices with common-centroid matching.

featured_projects.title: AI-Powered Code Assistant
featured_projects.subtitle: Natural Language to Code Generation
featured_projects.why: Empowering developers to write code faster using AI-driven suggestions and auto-completion.
featured_projects.description: Built an intelligent code assistant that uses GPT-4 to generate code snippets, refactor existing code, and provide real-time debugging suggestions. Integrated with VS Code for seamless workflow.

featured_projects.title: Real-Time Collaboration Platform
featured_projects.subtitle: Cloud-Based Document Editing
featured_projects.why: Enabling seamless real-time collaboration for distributed teams across the globe.
featured_projects.description: Developed a real-time collaborative document editing platform with conflict resolution, live cursors, and presence indicators. Supports rich text formatting and version history.

visual_projects.title: Interactive Data Dashboard
visual_projects.subtitle: Real-time Analytics Visualization
visual_projects.description: A dynamic dashboard designed to visualize complex datasets in real-time. Users can filter data, zoom into specific timeframes, and export reports. The screenshot demonstrates the multi-layered graph rendering engine in action.

visual_projects.title: Algorithm Visualizer
visual_projects.subtitle: Sorting & Pathfinding Demos
visual_projects.description: An educational tool that visualizes common algorithms like QuickSort, MergeSort, and A* Pathfinding. The GIF shows the step-by-step execution of the A* algorithm finding the shortest path in a grid.
